about_the_game:
When you return from the deep forests, you discover that your beloved goblin village has been devastated by a mysterious green mist. Your task now is to rebuild the village, while the stone formations in front of your village turn out to be portals to other dimensions through which monsters are constantly pouring into your world.

Building In Chaos


Decide where and how buildings are to be erected, and your hard-working goblin laborers will put your plans into action. In "Goblington" there are a variety of basic resources and production chains that you must use skillfully to rebuild your village and fend off the monster hordes at the same time. Every decision you make has far-reaching consequences for the survival of your village.

Choose Your Warriors


Assemble a team from a variety of unique units to defend your village. Utilize the synergies between the different units and evolve them to their most powerful form. Each playthrough is made unique by the combination of your hero choices, recruited units and collected items.

Take Care Of Your Troops


At night, your warriors retreat to the tavern to fortify themselves. The quality of the food you collect or cook during the day determines how much experience they gain.

Discover A New World


Explore a map full of secrets, hidden resources, items, units and monsters. Find stores and paths to make lasting progress and unlock new abilities and heroes. Rogue-lite mechanics ensure that your building and combat strategies are constantly expanding and becoming more diverse.

Features


  • Numerous challenging bosses that put your strategies to the test.
  • A wide variety of items as rewards for defeating a boss
  • A weather system with a direct influence on battles and resource procurement
  • Numerous recruitable units with many abilities.

name: Goblington

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E7500 (dual-core) / AMD® Athlon™ II X2 250 (dual-core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 630 (2 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 6670 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-750 (quad-core) / AMD® Phenom™ II X4 965 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 (2 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7750 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A rogue-lite style city-building game in a relaxed dark fantasy world. Explore your goblin kingdom, find interesting locations and choose your heroes. Defeat hordes of monsters, harvest, build, cook, feed and grow. Good luck!
